alert.note: Alert for Marion; Schley; Sumter; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 12:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion, Webster, Schley and northwestern Sumter Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1202 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Preston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Americus, Ellaville, Preston, Richland, Plains, Andersonville, Putnam, Murrays Crossroads, New Era, La Crosse, Draneville, Friendship, Bumphead, Church Hill, Centerpoint, Dumas and Walls Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
